author: virtualastronomer
description:
Description: PyFITS provides an interface to FITS formatted files under the Python
Homepage URL: http://www.stsci.edu/resources/software_hardware/pyfits

PyFITS provides an interface to FITS formatted files under the Python scripting language. PyFITS is a development project of the Science Software Branch at the Space Telescope Science Institute.

PyFITS has the widest use among python FITS api packages and is a dependency for many other astronomical python tools that access and manipulate FITS images and tables, including ATpy and ALPpy.

PyFITS dependencies are: numpy and python >=2.3.
title: PyFITS
